page.title: 15Shopping
page.content: Rainford, being a large village has a large selection of shops to cater for the needs of its population.It has two supermarkets and lots of small shops serving the day to day needs of the people. Six miles away is the town of St.Helens .This town has a much wider range of goods and services including department stores,major retail outlets such as Marks and Spencer,Boots the Chemist and Woolworth.Its shopping centre has numerous arcades ,markets and specialist shops providing goods such as cameras,sports equipment etc. For larger items and for a much wider choice of goods than St.Helens provides,people can travel to the major shopping centres of Manchester and Liverpool.
